title: Statement by the Press Secretary on H.R. 1308 | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
May 12, 2011

 



Statement by the Press Secretary on H.R. 1308





On Thursday, May 12, 2011, the President signed into law:
	Â 
	H.R. 1308, which extends the due date for the final report of the Ronald Reagan Centennial Commission from April 30, 2011, to November 30, 2011; and extends the termination date for the Commission from May 30, 2011, to December 31, 2011.
